channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Energy Management driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Energy Management driver

item.title: CVE-2019-6183|2024-09-16T18:50:15.393Z -- lenovo -- energy%20management%20driver
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability has been reported in Lenovo Energy Management Driver for Windows 10 versions prior to 15.11.29.7 that could cause systems to experience a blue screen error. Lenovo Energy Management is a client utility. Lenovo XClarity Energy Manager is not affected.
